title: Teams shine online at 11th annual Cleantech to Market Symposium
author: Natasha Payés
excerpt:
A sensor that can detect any type of gas leak and a chemical process that makes plastics biodegradable earned top prizes at the 11th annual Cleantech to Market Symposium. The event was held online for the first time on Dec. 4. Cleantech to Market (C2M) is a 15-week accelerator course that invites graduate students, industry […]
The post Teams shine online at 11th annual Cleantech to Market Symposium appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
